name: Trials of Wizardry (Demo Version)
description:
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

A puzzle platformer that takes place in a fantasy world being taken over by a dark sorcerer. You are a brand new wizard, who has just discovered your powers. You are the world’s last hope. Travel throughout the entire kingdom with your pet dragon, and use your newfound powers to defeat the evil sorcerer. Do you have what it takes to save the world?

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
